source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
ID -19 in pregnant and non- 
pregnant women.
• Most symptomatic women experience mild or moderate cold/flu-like symptoms
• The most common symptoms of COVID-19 in pregnant women are cough, fever, sore throat, dyspnoea, myalgia,
loss of sense of taste or smell and diarrhoea.
Referral and admission criteria for women with suspected or proven COVID-19 
• Obstetric risk factors or complications needing admission
• Co-morbidities
• Severity of COVID-19 disease (moderate and severe COVID-19 disease)
•
